snippet.title: EXPLOBERS [indie game launch trailer - AVAILABLE NOW]
snippet.description:
Download from itch.io: https://jdmgames.itch.io/explobers
Download from GameJolt: https://gamejolt.com/games/pumpkinpatchmatch/289962

Enjoy this trailer for EXPLOBERS--available now for Windows! Over 80 stages makes for an expansive and unique experience of collaborative, blast-and-build puzzle platforming. Control the Explobers as they work together to use their powers to reach impossible-seeming exits. A new, highly polished indie game from Whatnot Studios/John D. Moore, the solo developer behind CAVERNS OF KHRON and WATCH DUCKS.

A new game for Windows PCs, Explobers is heavily inspired by classic PC games like Lemmings, The Lost Vikings, and more. 

Visit its official website: http://explobers.bombdotcom.net/
